# Number of Bytes

> Size (in bytes) of a 32-bit signed integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var INT32_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int32-num-bytes' );
```

#### INT32_NUM_BYTES

Size (in bytes) of a 32-bit signed integer.

``` javascript
INT32_NUM_BYTES === 4;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var INT32_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int32-num-bytes' );

console.log( INT32_NUM_BYTES );
// => 4
```
